hero.title: Trade like a Korean Quant
hero.subtitle: With Korean-grade quantitative models and strict risk control, ordinary investors can also have institutional-level trading capabilities.
hero.subtitleHighlight: We don't predict the future, we only calculate probabilities.

kModel.title: K-Model Resonance Engine
kModel.description: No longer relying on a single indicator. We simultaneously monitor 15m / 1H / 4H multi-timeframe signals, and only trigger trades when trends resonate, significantly reducing market noise misjudgment.

aiTrading.title: DL-Signal Deep Learning
aiTrading.description: Signal filter trained on LSTM and Transformer architectures. Effectively identifies false breakouts and extreme market structures, avoiding liquidation in black swan events.

riskControl.title: Risk Budgeting Control
riskControl.description: Control losses, not profits. The system has built-in strict drawdown budgets and automatic exposure reduction mechanisms (De-risking), ensuring capital safety always takes precedence over profit growth.

signalProcessing.title: Signal Processing Engine
signalProcessing.description: Supports TradingView Webhook signal integration, real-time processing of multi-strategy signals, intelligent routing and execution, ensuring timely signal response.

multiExchange.title: Multi-Exchange Support
multiExchange.description: Integrates with major exchanges like Gate.io, unified interface management, supports spot and derivatives trading, flexible trading rule configuration.

basic.name: Basic Plan
basic.description: Suitable for low-cost validation of system stability

pro.name: Pro Quant Plan
pro.description: Custom for large capital users and institutions

enterprise.title: Exchange, Studio, or Asset Management Institution?
enterprise.description: We provide white-label systems, API signal integration, and customized risk control solutions.

footer.description:
Originated from Korean quantitative lab, serving global crypto investors.
Replace emotion with data, fight human nature with systems.

Based in Seoul & Singapore.
footer.risk: Important Risk Warning: Cryptocurrency trading carries extremely high market risks. All strategies, signals, and backtest data provided by Crypto-K Quants are for reference only and do not constitute any investment advice. Past returns do not represent future performance. Users should always independently control account permissions and bear the risk of capital losses from copy trading. This service does not provide 'principal guarantee' or 'profit guarantee' services.
